description: This map depicts the average annual soil loss in metric tonnes per 100,000 hectares under the existing land use/land cover scenario for 2011.
This map depicts the average annual soil loss in metric tonnes per 100,000 hectares under a land use/land cover scenario in which natural vegetation has been replaced with barren land for 2011.
This map depicts the average annual sediment yield to waterbodies in metric tonnes per 100,000 hectares under the existing land use/land cover scenario for 2011.

This map depicts the average annual sediment yield to the nearest waterbody in metric tonnes per 100,000 hectares under a land use/land cover scenario in which natural vegetation has been replaced with barren land for 2011.
